Package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.handlerlist

Interface HandlerList<T extends Event>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of event
public interface HandlerList<T extends Event>
An interface that manages listeners of the event.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • create

      @Contract(value=" -> new", pure=true) @NotNull static <T extends Event> @NotNull HandlerList<T> create()
      Creates a new HandlerList.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of event
      Returns:
      a new HandlerList

    • post

      void post​(@NotNull T event)
      Dispatches the event to subscribed listeners.

      If the exception logger has been set by setExceptionLogger(Logger), it should log any exceptions that occur while processing this method.

      Parameters:
      event - the event instance

    • subscribe

      boolean subscribe​(@NotNull @NotNull Key key, @NotNull @NotNull Listener<T> listener)
      Subscribes the listener.

      This method subscribes the listener with Priority.NORMAL.

      Parameters:
      key - the key to be used to subscribe the listener
      listener - the listener to subscribe
      Returns:
      true if it is subscribed, false otherwise

    • subscribe

      boolean subscribe​(@NotNull @NotNull Key key, @NotNull @NotNull Listener<T> listener, @NotNull @NotNull Priority priority)
      Subscribes the listener.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to be used to subscribe the listener
      listener - the listener to subscribe
      priority - the priority of the listener
      Returns:
      true if it is subscribed, false otherwise

    • unsubscribe

      boolean unsubscribe​(@NotNull @NotNull Listener<T> listener)
      Unsubscribes the listener.

      The listener instance must be the same as when you subscribed it to be unregistered.

      Parameters:
      listener - the listener instance to unsubscribe
      Returns:
      true if it is unsubscribed, false otherwise

    • unsubscribe

      boolean unsubscribe​(@NotNull @NotNull Listener<T> listener, @NotNull @NotNull Priority priority)
      Unsubscribes the listener of the specified priority.

      The listener instance must be the same as when you subscribed it to be unsubscribed.

      Parameters:
      listener - the listener instance to unsubscribe
      priority - the priority of the listener.
      Returns:
      true if it is unsubscribed, false otherwise

    • unsubscribeAll

      void unsubscribeAll​(@NotNull @NotNull Key key)
      Unsubscribes all listeners subscribed with the specified Key.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to unsubscribe

    • getSize

      int getSize()
      Gets the number of subscribed listeners.
      Returns:
      the number of subscribed listeners.

    • setExceptionLogger

      void setExceptionLogger​(@Nullable @Nullable Logger logger)
      Sets the logger to logging exceptions.

      The default exception logger is null, which means that it will not log any exceptions that occur while processing an event.

      Parameters:
      logger - the logger to logging exceptions
